scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../functions && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm run test && cd ../functions && npm run test
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../functions && npm run lint
